title: Running
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
From the first time I felt the click in my heart
I keep running, oh, I keep running away
Try to sleep but the aching tears me apart
I keep running, oh, I keep running away
Oh, am I wasting the day? (Woo)
I keep running, oh, I keep running away
Oh does it hurt me to stay? (Woo)
I keep running, oh, 'cause I don't wanna pay
[Pre-Chorus]
Stars shine but start to fade in the light
Love is blind, could be wrong or it could be right
In a bind telling myself it's for you
[Chorus]
For you
Running and running
Running and running
Running and running
Hey, hey, hey, hey
For you
Running and running
Running and running
Running and running
Hey, hey

[Verse 2]
In the night the devil knocks on my door
I keep running, oh, I keep running away
Another life and the same thing happened before
I keep running, oh, I keep running away
Oh and he begs me to stay (Woo)
I keep running, oh, I keep running away
Oh will he take mе away? (Woo)
I keep running, oh, 'cause I don't wanna pay
[Pre-Chorus]
Stars shine but start to fade in thе light
Love is blind, could be wrong or it could be right
In a bind telling myself it's for you
[Chorus]
For you
Running and running
Running and running
Running and running
Hey, hey, hey, hey
For you
Running and running
Running and running
Running and running
Hey, hey, hey, hey
For you
Running and running
Running and running
Running and running
Hey, hey

[Outro]
(Woo)
(Woo)
(Woo)
